meta_description: The Museum of Contemporary Art Denver explores the art and culture of our time through rotating exhibitions and public educational programs.

## Visit

**Take a closer look at our world-class exhibitions, off-beat programs, and craft cocktails on the rooftop.**

Learn more about the art currently on view [here](https://mcadenver.org/exhibitions).

**Please note:** While reservations are not required and walk-ups are welcome, advanced notice **IS REQUIRED** for **ALL** groups over 10 people.

[ General Admission Tickets ](https://20555p.blackbaudhosting.com/20555p/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=1386990e-6200-4f13-bfed-b7522ee78611)

[ $5 After 5PM Tickets ](https://20555p.blackbaudhosting.com/20555p/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=fc5cf989-dfc7-4fb6-84a6-0554d9d9e083)

## Hours & Admission

Saturday-Sunday| 10am-5pm  
  
### Admission

**Please note:** Advanced notice is REQUIRED for ALL groups over 10 people.

Adults| $14  
---|---  
After 5pm Tuesday- Thursday| $5  
Student| $11  
65+| $11  
Members| Free  
Teens 13 to 18| Free  
Children under 12| Free  
  
ID Required for Students & 65+

accessibility_text:
[ Visit ](https://mcadenver.org/visit) [ Shop ](https://mcadenver.org/shop) [ Café & Bar ](https://mcadenver.org/visit/cafe-and-bar) [ Tours ](https://mcadenver.org/visit/tours) [ Digital Guide ](https://mcadenver.org/visit/free-digital-guide) [ Accessibility ](https://mcadenver.org/visit/accessibility)

## Accessibility

MCA Denver strives to create an accessible environment for all visitors. Our galleries, offices, restrooms, and public spaces are all wheelchair accessible. We have one wheelchair available for our guests. Please contact the museum to reserve one for your visit or for any additional arrangements.

## Frequently asked questions

### **Do you allow dogs in the museum?**

Service animals are always welcome in the museum. We ask that other dogs remain at home.

### **Can I bring food and/​or drinks?**

While we do not allow outside food and beverages in the museum, [MCA Café & Bar](https://mcadenver.org/visit/cafe-and-bar) is open every Tuesday – Sunday offering non-alcoholic beverages, a full bar, and small bites featuring exhibition-inspired originals and a rotating seasonal menu. We invite you to enjoy your refreshments in the café or on our rooftop deck. Drinks and food are prohibited in all of the galleries. If you are a [member](https://mcadenver.org/join-and-support/membership), be sure to let the staff know to get your exclusive discount!

### **Is the museum wheelchair accessible?**

Yes. MCA Denver’s galleries, offices, restrooms, and public spaces are...
